Reviews.Title: “Clean, compact, friendly B&B. Perfect for the budget city break”
Reviews.Author: SAD87
Reviews.Content: converted apartment recently refurbished clean bathroom facilities standard bb 5 minute walk road metro station piramide overground connections ostia makes location excellent spend days city beach breakfast takes format help yourself kitchen stocked juice yogurts bread jam brioche style sweet breads coffee machine makes excellent coffee highly recommend bb looking clean comfortable city break 100 euros night apparently free wifi didnt facility

Reviews.Title: “Very nice b&b. Perfect for independent stay in Rome.”
Reviews.Author: GalinaMartinez
Reviews.Content: liked lot bb beautiful interior apartment quiet furniture modern equipment clean kitchen comfortable location ok 5 min walking metrobus stop 1015 min bus city center 2 stops subway colosseum staff nice helpful people definitely value money bad train passes meters 1 trains pass night time 11 pm 6 am 2 dont hear window closed trains didnt disturb

HotelInfo.Name: Cleopatra B&B
